incident_description: Former R&D manager allegedly copied proprietary drug formulations before leaving to join competitor
discovery_method: Security audit detected unauthorized data downloads 2 days before resignation

computer_forensics.finding: Email to competitor (BioPharm Inc) found on company computer

email_content.subject: Ready to join - Have proprietary IP
email_content.body: I can bring PharmaTech's latest drug formulations and trial data. This will accelerate your pipeline by 3 years. We can launch competing product within 12 months.

witness_statements.statement: Michael told me 'I'm taking insurance before I leave. They didn't appreciate my work.' He meant the data.

legal_actions.injunction: Court order preventing use of stolen data
legal_actions.employee_liability: PharmaTech suing own employee for damages
